free_text.Content: Introduction, stress in thin film, effect of stress in film-solid thin film failure, experimental evaluation of mechanical properties of thin films.[br/][br/]Note: Textbook: L.B. Freund and S. Suresh, Thin Film Materials, Cambridge Univ. Press 2004 (textbook is not necessary for course participation, handouts and lecture notes will provide sufficient information but the textbook is a valuable reference for anyone working in the field). Fours hours of laboratory exercices will be held at the EMPA-Thun-Laboratory of Mechanics of Materials and Nanostructures so that students can witness and take part in actual experimental evaluations and testing of thin films. [br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Elementary knowledge of solid mechanics and materials (e.g. strength of materials, elasticity, continuum mechanics, mechanical behaviour of materials and chemistry of materials)
